item.title: Installing a TMG Enterprise Management Server and Migrating and Existing Standalone Array: Part 1
item.description: This is my current scenario: there are two existing servers in a stand-alone array - TMG01 and TMG02, and over in a DR site there is a new server (TMG03) that is in the process of being built. To comply with DR, all 3 servers must have their configurations up to date, however there is no direct communication allowed between the two DMZs, so simply adding to the new server as anÂ array member is not possible.
